sentence.Network_en: She clutched the mask and breathed short and deep, pantingly, making the respirator click.
sentence.Network_cn: 她抓住面罩, 呼呼地吸气,又短促又深入, 弄得呼吸器答答响.

means.word_mean: 1. as someone winded and out of breath;

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
